item.title: I Hate My AI Friend
item.description: The chatbot-enabled Friend necklace eavesdrops on your life and provides a running commentary that’s snarky and unhelpful. Worse, it can also make the...

item.title: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds (2nd Gen): Excellent Buds
item.description: With slight, useful changes like wireless charging and better processing, these noise-canceling buds remain at the top of the pile.

item.title: How to Add WIRED as a Preferred Source on Google (2025)
item.description: The new Google Preferred Sources tool helps you see more of what you want in your search results.

item.title: The New Math of Quantum Cryptography
item.description: In theory, quantum physics can bypass the hard mathematical problems at the root of modern encryption. A new proof shows how.

item.title: Psychological Tricks Can Get AI to Break the Rules
item.description: Researchers convinced large language model chatbots to comply with “forbidden” requests using a variety of conversational tactics.
